TruChIP Chromatin Preparation Low Cell SDS (Covaris)
Duty Cycle: 5 , Peak Incident Power: 140 , Cycles per Burst: 200 , Processing Time: 25 min
Auto Histone ChIP Kit (Diagenode). Decrosslink + RNase/Proteinase K treatment 30 min 37 degrees + 4 hrs 65 degrees. Purification with Qiagen MinElute kit
NEBNext Universal PCR Primer for Illumina (NEB, E7335) 5´-AATGATACGGCGACCACCGAGATCTACACTCTTTCCCTACACGACGCTCTTCCGATC*T-3´

Rep1: NEBNext Index 6 Primer for Illumina (NEB, E7500) Rep1:_5´-CAAGCAGAAGACGGCATACGAGATCGATTGGCGTGACTGGAGTTCAGACGTGTGCTCTTCCGATC-s-T-3´ Rep2:_NEBNext_Index_15_Primer_for_Illumina_(NEB,_E7500) Rep2:_5´-CAAGCAGAAGACGGCATACGAGATCGTGACATGTGACTGGAGTTCAGACGTGTGCTCTTCCGATC-s-T-3´
not given in the protocol (1µl of universal and 1 µl of index primer per 50 µl PCR reaction)
Initial Denaturation: 98°C for 30 sec; 10 cycles: 98°C for 10 sec, 65°C for 30 sec, 72°C for 30 sec; Final extension: 72°C for 5 min; Hold at 4°C
Rep1: Prior to PCR not meassured, Starting amount for library preparation: 7.4 ng fragmented IP DNA Rep2:_Prior_to_PCR_not_meassured,_Starting_amount_for_library_preparation:_15_ng_fragmented_IP_DNA_
Agencourt AMPure XP Beads (Beckman Coulter, A63881)
Fragment size distribution from 200 bp to 1000 bp, Peak fragment size: 300 bp
multiplex paired end (2x50 bp, 7 bp Index)
